text:
brahmavarcaqsamaqstviti# gAyatriqyA pari# daddhyAd-brahmavarcaqsaM ~Mvai gA#yaqtrI bra#hmavarcaqsamEqva Ba#vati saqptadaqSAnu# brUyAqd-vaiSya#sya saptadaqSO vai vaiSyaqH sva Eqvainaq(gg)q stOmEq prati# ShThApayatiqjaga#tyAq pari# daddhyAqjjAga#tAq vai paqSava#H paqSukA#maqH Kaluq vai vaiSyO# yajatEq jaga#tyaiqvAsmai# paqSUn 
pari# gRuhNAqtyE ka#vi(gm) Satiqmanu# brUyAt pratiqShThAkA#masyai kaviq(gm)qSaH stOmA#nAM pratiqShThA prati#ShThityaiq - [  ]  58
